sentences.sContent: We are fighting to save the world from the pestilence of Nazi tyranny -(Cheers)-and in defence of all that is most sacred to man.
sentences.sContent_eng: We are fighting to save the world from the pestilence of Nazi tyranny -(Cheers)-and in defence of all that is most sacred to man.
sentences.sCn: 我们要为从纳粹暴政的瘟疫下拯救世界而战（欢呼），要为捍卫所有对人类来说无比神圣的价值而战。

synos.tran: [医]瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物

remMethod.val: 来自pestilen (t) (致命的； 瘟疫的) + ce → 瘟疫

words.tran: 致命的；有害的；恼人的；危害社会的
传播疾病的；有害的，毒害的；邪恶的
引起瘟疫的；瘟疫似的；讨厌的
害虫；有害之物；讨厌的人

trans.tranCn: 瘟疫（尤指鼠疫）；有害的事物
trans.tranOther: a disease that spreads quickly and kills a lot of people
